correlation preprocessing

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_workflowFunctions.R
workflow_correlation_preprocessing_protein_intensities.Rd

correlation preprocessing

workflow_correlation_preprocessing_protein_intensities(
  pdata,
  config,
  minCorrelation = 0.7
)

Arguments

pdata

data.frame

config

AnalysisConfiguration

minCorrelation

correlation threshold default 0.7

See also

Other workflows: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, workflow_DIA_NA_preprocessing(), workflow_corr_filter_impute()

Other deprecated: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, compute_roc(), intensity_summary_by_hkeys(), medpolish_protein_quants(), workflow_DIA_NA_preprocessing()

Examples




rm(list=ls())
bb <- prolfqua_data('data_ionstar')$filtered()
#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(bb$data) == 25780)
config <- bb$config$clone(deep=TRUE)
data <- bb$data
data$nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id <- NULL

config$parameter$min_nr_of_notNA  <- 3
#debug(workflow_correlation_preprocessing_protein_intensities)
runLong <- FALSE
if(runLong){
res <- workflow_correlation_preprocessing_protein_intensities(data,config)
names(res)
}
